urls.value: <content>Ask to become a member</content> <title>Request to join ${project.title:xml} as a member</title> <href>/ProjectManagementTeam.do?command=ConfirmAskToBecomeMember&pid=${project.id}</href> <rel>shadowbox;width=500</rel> <rule>userCanRequestToJoin</rule>
